p: Pacific mackerel (28–30 cm in size, weight 230–250 g) were purchased at local fishery market (Zhoushan, China) and transported back to the laboratory in ice. Chitosan with deacetylation degree of 95% and molecular weight of 80–90 KDa was purchased from Qingdao Yunzhou Biotechnology Co. Ltd, China. Citrus essential oil was purchased from Flowers Shop TM (Shanghai, China) and encapsulated in a glass bottle under 4°C. Analytical grade chemical reagents were purchased from Sinopharm Group Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd., (Shanghai, China).
